page.title: 05MODERN BUILDINGS IN SINFIN.
page.content: We asked a builder how long it would take to build a house.He said 9 days and to build a house you need about 8 people.The main difficulty is bad weather.He said it doesn't matter which sort of land to build on. The houses being built now are mostly detached and have two floors.Houses are now being built with garages,but no chimneys.The building company buys the land and the architect designs the houses which the builders then build. Then the joiners erect the roof and put in the windows and doors.After this the plumbers put in pipes for water and heating and at the same time the electrician puts in the wiring and electric cables.Then the plasterer plasters the walls.Houses are made of brick,slate,concrete and wood with plaster covering the inside walls. BY CHRISTOPHER,CARL,COLIN AND DAMIAN
